Unit test for release note


Running: getLatestReleaseNote
Last seen version: 4
Showed release note in drawer - version: 5

Running: getReleaseNoteTwoVersionsAhead
Last seen version: 3
Showed release note in drawer - version: 5

Running: alreadySeenReleaseNote
Last seen version: 5
Did not show release note drawer

Running: doNotShowReleaseNoteOnFreshProfile
Last seen version: 0
Did not show release note drawer
Release note version in setting: 5

Running: showReleaseNoteSetting

Disabled showReleaseNote setting
Last seen version: 4
Did not show release note drawer

Enabled showReleaseNote setting
Last seen version: 4
Showed release note in drawer - version: 5
